io.micronaut.pulsar.scope

Class PulsarClientScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.pulsar.scope.PulsarClientScope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.LifeCycle<PulsarClientScope>, io.micronaut.context.scope.CustomScope<PulsarProducerClient>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @Singleton
public final class PulsarClientScope
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.micronaut.context.scope.CustomScope<PulsarProducerClient>, io.micronaut.context.LifeCycle<PulsarClientScope>
    A scope implementation for injecting PulsarProducerClient instances.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haris Secic
